More than 40 days ago, students who were preparing to become rural teachers were ambushed by a joint force of policemen and thugs, they killed 6-7 and kidnapped the rest, who have been missing ever since. The order for the attack was given by a minor government official. How would people react in your dountry, what kind of measures would you take?

Fuck the media.
